script:
1). What do you think of our new manager?
He seems to be very smart. 
Our manager is Mr. Wang.
Yes, I agree that he's strict.
2). Where in the world did you get that idea?
I bought it in a department store.
Thank you. It is a good idea!
From a website on the Internet. 
3). Do you know why Patty's not here?
I do know why she is here.
No, I don't. She should be. 
No, she doesn't know why.
